column1: Little Goat Diner////But the surprise winner of the night were their house-made matzo chips
column2: which basically are just an accoutrement
column3: or a vehicle to get the star of the dish from the plate to your mouth - but they are in my opinion a home run in every way. Get the choco-taco dessert (featuring chocolate-dipped matzo chips)
column4: and you'll see what I mean.
